sense.gloss: sufficient, satisfactory, enough, adequate, proper, decent
full load, being fully loaded (with), being loaded to capacity (with), carrying a full load (of)
being full of (articles, photos, etc.; of a newspaper or magazine)
to satisfy (conditions, one's appetite, etc.), to meet (e.g. demands), to fulfill, to gratify
to fill (e.g. a cup), to pack, to supply
full house, no vacancy, sold out, standing room only, full (of people), crowded
having one's fill (of food or drink), eating (drinking) to one's heart's content
full bloom (esp. of cherry blossom), full blossom

sdata.j: あなたに↑不満↑↓ふまん↓があります。
sdata.e: I have a bone to pick with you.

sdata.j: ↑日焼↑↓ひや↓け↑止↑↓ど↓めを↑塗↑↓ぬ↓りたくないならそれは↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑問題↑↓もんだい↓だからいいけれど、でも↑日焼↑↓ひや↓けしたからって↑僕↑↓ぼく↓に↑不満↑↓ふまん↓を↑言↑↓い↓うのは↑止↑↓や↓めてくれよ。
sdata.e: If you don't want to put on sunscreen, that's your problem. Just don't come complaining to me when you get a sunburn.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑仕事↑↓しごと↓に↑欲求↑↓よっきゅう↓↑不満↑↓ふまん↓を↑感↑↓かん↓じている。
sdata.e: You are frustrated with your work.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑仕事↑↓しごと↓に↑欲求↑↓よっきゅう↓↑不満↑↓ふまん↓を↑感↑↓かん↓じている。
sdata.e: You are frustrated with your work.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑不平↑↓ふへい↓↑不満↑↓ふまん↓にはうんざりだよ。
↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑答↑↓こた↓えなんて↑決↑↓けっ↓して↑満足↑↓まんぞく↓のいくものではない。
sdata.e: Your answer is far from satisfactory.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑言動↑↓げんどう↓は↑決↑↓けっ↓して↑満足↑↓まんぞく↓のいくものではない。
sdata.e: I am far from pleased with your behavior.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓には↑不満↑↓ふまん↓が↑全↑↓まった↓くない。
sdata.e: You've got nothing to complain of.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑黙↑↓だま↓っているのを↑見↑↓み↓ると↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑答↑↓こた↓えでは↑不満↑↓ふまん↓なのだね。
sdata.e: I take it from your silence that you are not satisfied with my answer.

sdata.j: ↑金持↑↓かねも↓ちであるにもかかわらず、↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑満足↑↓まんぞく↓していない。
sdata.e: For all his wealth, he is not contented.

words.gloss: full load, being fully loaded (with), being loaded to capacity (with), carrying a full load (of)
